Both attesting witnesses had moved around the GPE house freely and , given the layout of the LOC , must have seen and heard the events in the courtyard . However , as is apparent from the ORG explanations , they did not notice any unlawful conduct by the policemen .

[ The conclusions of the forensic report issued by the expert of ORG ] were overturned by a commission of the [ same office ] ... The commission described [ the eighth applicant ’s ] injuries recorded on DATE as ‘ not entailing consequences for [ the applicant ’s ] CARDINAL .
